name: Cozy Carving
description:
For Cozy Fall Jam 2022

There's not really much of a goal here, just carving pumpkins. Up to 9 carved pumpkins can be saved and added to the shelf. You can press the job button to start a new request. There's no reward for completing the requests, but it can be fun to see how badly you can mess it up and still be counted. Hope y'all have fun messing around with this. 

Controls:

Q and E to rotate selected object

+ and - to scale selected object

R to reset scale and rotation of selected object

F to flip selected object horizontally

Delete key to delete selected object

Credits

Font - https://v3x3d.itch.io/border-basic

Everything Else - Me
